net.sf.freecol.common.model

Class Turn

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.freecol.common.model.Turn

  • public class Turn
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a given turn in the game.

      • ages

        private static final int[] ages
        The first years of the "ages" of the game, which are only used for weighting FoundingFathers.

      • NUMBER_OF_AGES

        public static final int NUMBER_OF_AGES
        The number of ages. Used by FoundingFather for age-dependent weights.

        Returns:
